mapper.select: select c.openid from card_info c, follower f where c.id = f.user_id and f.follower_id = #{followerId}
mapper.insert: insert into card_message_send(card_id, message_id, openid) values(#{cardId}, #{messageId}, #{openid})
insert into card_info_send(card_id, new_card_id, openid) values(#{cardId}, #{newCardId}, #{openid})
mapper.select: select distinct open_id from auth_record where type = 2;
mapper.update: update auth_record set auth_status = 0 where type = 2
mapper.insert: insert into wx_small_formId(card_id, form_id, is_use) values(#{cardId}, #{formId}, #{isUse})
mapper.update: update wx_small_formId set is_use = #{isUse} where form_id = #{formId}
mapper.sql: select id, card_id, form_id, is_use, create_time from wx_small_formId where is_use = 0 and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= create_time
mapper.select: select id, card_id, form_id, is_use, create_time from wx_small_formId where card_id = #{cardId} and is_use = 0 and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) <= create_time order by create_time

select w.id, w.card_id, w.form_id, w.is_use, w.create_time, c.openid from wx_small_formId w, card_info c where w.card_id = c.id and is_use = 0 and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) <= create_time group by w.card_id order by create_time
